comments.body: Would it be possible for you to use the AWSRetry decorator here, so that instead of failing there will be a little bit of tolerance to the API being throttled/unavailable?

Hi @ryansb 

I'd love to implement this but are there any other modules or examples I can use to assist with this? If there's other AWS modules that you know of with this implemented that would be an excellent reference.

Yes, the CloudFormation module uses AWSRetry, see [here](https://github.com/ansible/ansible/blob/devel/lib/ansible/modules/cloud/amazon/cloudformation.py#L364-L366) for an example. Just import the retry, and then use that decorator to do the backoff/retry.
